item.title: THM RootMe Walkthrough
item.description: One of the best ways to learn ethical hacking is to practice it. So below is a walkthrough of the RootMe Room on THM Reconnaissance Nmap As with most machines, I began with an Nmap scan - which answers the first few questions. I firstly scanned with sV to determine the software versions, however as the target wouldn’t respond to host discovery, I had to disable it using the -Pn option.
